segments.text: Hey , Tom . You look tired . Are you all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't sleep much last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know Miao Li-my roommate , he bought a computer last month . He has turned his computer into an electronic playground . He plays football , rides horses , drives racing cars , and does a whole bunch of other games . Every night he keeps me up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I usually get a lot of information on the computer and use E-mail to send messages to my friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . Recently , I've made many friends on the net . Every day I talk to them and share many interesting things with them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you think it's a sheer waste of both time and money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not . To me getting in touch with each other has more fun than the coolest computer games or the hottest information .
segments.speaker: S1
